text: ema kalaya athulatha papandu sammelanaya labadena prathichara anuwa nilawaranaya pawathwimata hakiyawa labenu athi bawa krida adhyaksha jenaral ranjani jayakodi mahathmiya pawasayi.krida amathyanshaya wetha labadena pilithuren amathiwaraya sahimakata pathwuwahoth kalin niyamakaragath paridi papandu sammelanaye nilawaranaya marthu 9wanida pawathwenu athi bawada aya pawasuwaya.shri lanka papandu sammelanaya thula kriyathmaka wu kalamanakarana kamituwa ahosikota ehi siyalu wathkam ha balaya papandu sammelanaye widhayaka sabhawata pawariya yuthu bawata pradhana kondesiyak panawa atha.

hadisi nithiya ha tha්rasthawadaya walakwime panatha yatathe randawa thabagena sitina deshapalana sirakaruwan nidahas karana lesath, punaruththapana sewa muwawen uthuru saha nagenahira palathwala rajya anuga්rahayen sidu kerena sinhala janawasakaranaya athhituwana lesath, anthar kalina paripalana sabhawak pihituwana lesath, uthuru – nagenahira palathwala abhinawa polis sthana pihituwima nawathana lesath, pasal saha adhyapana aayathana athulu podu godanagili thula randawa sitina aarakshaka sena iwath kara ga්ramarakshaka bhata piris nirayudha karana lesath illa thilipan wisin ekalos dinak thisse sidukala maranthika upawasaya ohuge maranayen nima wuye 1987 sapthambar 26 wanida ya.
